flawed_nl_solution:
He will use $250 in fuel because 5 x 50 = <<5*50=250>>250
He will be shark hunting for 3000 minutes because 5 x 60 = <<5*60=3000>>3000
He can expect to see 300 sharks because 3000 / 10 = <<3000/10=300>>300
He will make $4500 off these photos because 300 x 15 = <<300*15=4500>>4500
He will make $4250 in profit because 4500 - 250 = <<4500-250=4250>>4250
#### 4250

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 3000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
